message: Use Sources and Sinks for all IO.

Polish OutputCapture and its JUnit Jupiter extension <enter>  <enter> - Polish Javadoc <enter> - Improve error message in OutputCapture <enter> - Use ExtensionContext.Store in OutputCaptureExtension <enter>  <enter> See gh-17049
Polish
Correct reference to RC1.

Report non-matching outer class conditions <enter>  <enter> Update ConditionEvaluationReport so that, whenever a negative outcome <enter> is added for a source, any existing outcomes for inner classes of that <enter> source are updated with a non-matching outcome that indicates that the <enter> outer configuration did not match. <enter>  <enter> Conditions are evaluated in two phases; PARSE_CONFIGURATION first and <enter> REGISTER_BEAN second. If a parent classâ€™s conditions match in <enter> PARSE_CONFIGURATION then its inner classes will have their <enter> PARSE_CONFIGURATION conditions evaluated. If they all match, the inner <enter> class will be reported as a positive match in the auto-configuration <enter> report even if the outer class does not match as a result of the <enter> subsequent evaluation of a REGISTER_BEAN condition. <enter>  <enter> Fixes gh-2122
Add JUnit 5 checkstyle rules <enter>  <enter> Add a rule to enforce JUnit 5 usage and conventions. <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-17093
Upgrade to jOOQ 3.8.4 <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-6476

Allow early OnWebApplication filtering <enter>  <enter> Update `OnWebApplicationCondition` to be an <enter> `AutoConfigurationImportFilter` and filter out classes early. <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-13328

Refine validator and MVC validator configuration <enter>  <enter> This commit ensures that a primary JSR 303 and Spring Validator will be <enter> exposed if the auto-configuration kicks in. As `LocalValidatorFactoryBean` <enter> exposes 3 contracts (JSR-303 `Validator` and `ValidatorFactory` as well as <enter> the `Spring` validator one), this makes sure that those types can be <enter> injected by type. <enter>  <enter> `LocalValidatorFactoryBean` exposes 3 contracts and we're only checking <enter> for the absence of a `javax.validation.Validator` to auto-configure a <enter> `LocalValidatorFactoryBean`. If no standard JSR validator exists but a <enter> Spring's `Validator` exists and is primary, we shouldn't flag the <enter> auto-configured one as `@Primary`. Previous iterations on this feature <enter> have made sure that we'll auto-configure at most one <enter> `javax.validation.Validator` so not flagging it `@Primary` is no problem. <enter>  <enter> This commit also restores and adds tests that validates <enter> `ValidationAutoConfiguration` will configure a JSR validator even if a <enter> Spring Validator is present. <enter>  <enter> This effectively fixes gh-8495 in a different way. <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-8979 <enter> Closes gh-8976
Upgrade to Appengine Sdk 1.9.67 <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-14955
Expose Headers directly on MockResponse.

Fix a severe bug where multiple TLS tunnels were attempted. <enter>  <enter> The previous code would attempt a TLS tunnel on reused <enter> HTTPS connections, even after the tunnel had been established. <enter> This is a severe protocol error!

Squashed commit of the following: <enter>  <enter> commit d5f3ef15e9822c03dc0d107a9944f730c5c8d710 <enter> Author: Quinn Neumiiller <quinnjn@gmail.com> <enter> Date:   Tue Apr 7 16:15:51 2015 -0600 <enter>  <enter>     userRequest should always be sent back, networkRequest is included in networkResponse. <enter>  <enter> commit bc7f5372b9ad9b68affef333ec259789cd342be0 <enter> Author: Quinn Neumiiller <quinnjn@gmail.com> <enter> Date:   Mon Apr 6 20:19:27 2015 -0600 <enter>  <enter>     Updating networkRequest when interceptors touch the request, attaching the request update to the userResponse. <enter>  <enter> commit ae5b3ca59f75bc068a5cab2a68465cdef9f4f5ec <enter> Author: Quinn Neumiiller <quinnjn@gmail.com> <enter> Date:   Mon Apr 6 18:36:38 2015 -0600 <enter>  <enter>     Add a test for interceptor requests in the response
Fix documentation for health endpoint security <enter>  <enter> Fixes gh-9273

Introduce defined extension point for modifying the environment <enter>  <enter> The commit introduces a new extension point, EnvironmentPostProcessor, <enter> that can be implemented by classes that want to modify the <enter> environment. Implementations of EnvironmentPostProcessor are loaded <enter> via spring.factories and called in response to the <enter> ApplicationEnvironmentPreparedEvent. Application listeners that wish <enter> to work with the post-processed environment can continue to listen <enter> to ApplicationEnvironmentPreparedEvent and order themselves to <enter> run after EnvironmentPostProcessingApplicationListener. <enter>  <enter> Existing ApplicationListeners that modify the environment have, <enter> where possible, been updated to implement EnvironmentPostProcessor <enter> instead. <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-3737

Fix ordering of keys in PropertySourcesPropertyValues <enter>  <enter> Since @ConfigurationProperties binding uses a single instance of <enter> PropertySourcesPropertyValues per bean, there doesn't seem to be <enter> any issue with using a normal LinkedHashMap. Then the order <enter> passed in as PropertySources will be preserved. <enter>  <enter> Fixes gh-2487
Upgrade to Neo4J OGM 2.1.3 <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-9335
Upgrade to Jboss Logging 3.4.1.Final <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-18066

Default Tomcat to not save SESSIONS.ser file <enter>  <enter> Update TomcatEmbeddedServletContainerFactory so that session data isn't <enter> serialized by default. Prior to this commit the SESSIONS.ser file would <enter> either be written to `/tmp` or into `baseDir` (if one was set). <enter>  <enter> By not saving session data we align Tomcat with the other embedded <enter> servlet containers and reduce the risk of sensitive information being <enter> left in `/tmp`. <enter>  <enter> Fixes gh-4156
Add convenience overload for ByteString-backed RequestBody.
Polishing
Rename classpath runner package <enter>  <enter> Remove `runner` since we're no longer tied to JUnit 4. <enter>  <enter> See gh-17491
Support 204 and 205 'No Content' replies when application interceptor.
Remove 'jar-with-dependencies' qualifier from download link. <enter>  <enter> This link is used when the jQuery Maven Artifact plugin cannot resolve the absolute URL of the latest artifact.
Update to h2-16, hpack-10.
Polish 'Improve docs on custom metrics' <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-12324
Stop Jersey from pulling in duplicate classes with JDK 11+ <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-17404
Use the Mongo starter for the sample application <enter>  <enter> See gh-1831
Fix link formatting in custom HealthIndicator section <enter>  <enter> See gh-18170
Close the context in TypeExcludeFilterTests <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-5672
Upgrade to Cassandra Driver 3.7.2 <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-17705
Improve logging of Jetty port(s) <enter>  <enter> Fixes gh-2194
Remove public modifier on JUnit5 lifecycle methods <enter>  <enter> See gh-17292

HttpURL parsing. <enter>  <enter> This includes everything but character encoding. The implementation <enter> is built around one oversized method that runs top to bottom; I found <enter> this was easier to follow than the switch statement recommended by the <enter> URL standard.

Notify the use of logback specific system property <enter>  <enter> Logback documentation explains how to initialize the logging system and <enter> namely how the `logback.configurationFile` system property can be used to <enter> specify the configuration file to use. <enter>  <enter> Spring Boot has an abstraction on top of that. A user can define the <enter> `logging.path` property regardless of the logging infrastructure it is <enter> using. <enter>  <enter> Users following the logback documentation can be confused at first so <enter> we're not logging a warning when we found out that the logback specific <enter> property has been specified. <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-2382

Upstream commit of Android SNI / NPN fix <enter>  <enter> https://android-review.googlesource.com/#/c/111211 <enter>  <enter> The change's to Android's Platform have been ported. <enter>  <enter> This does not include the introduction of PlatformTest, <enter> which will be difficult to write so it works everywhere.
Fix JsonParser deprecation <enter>  <enter> See gh-18750

Add @IntegrationComponentScan auto-configuration <enter>  <enter> Update Spring Integration auto-configuration so that <enter> `@IntegrationComponentScan` from `AutoConfigurationPackages` is <enter> implicitly applied. Prior to this commit `@MessagingGateway` interfaces <enter> would only get picked up if `@IntegrationComponentScan` was added <enter> alongside with the `@SpringBootApplication`. <enter>  <enter> Fixes gh-2037 <enter> Closes gh-7718
Use a Buffer for body contents.
Upgrade to Exec Maven Plugin 1.5.0 <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-6302

Add Tomcat 7 and Jetty 8 samples <enter>  <enter> Switch the Tomcat 8 and Jetty 9 samples to Tomcat 7 and Jetty 8. Since <enter> Tomcat 8 and Jetty 9 are now the default versions the previous samples <enter> are no longer relevant, however, we do need integration tests to check <enter> that we remain compatible with Tomcat 7 and Jetty 8. <enter>  <enter> See gh-1832
Upgrade Java 13 version in CI image <enter>  <enter> See gh-17839
Update Javadoc example

Implement simpler exclusion logic for Gradle <enter>  <enter> Simplify the exclusion logic used in Gradle by implementing implicit <enter> exclusions rather than trying to detect transitive excludes. <enter>  <enter> This commit reverts much of the code originally included to fix gh-1047 <enter> which adds far too much complexity to the build and still doesn't solve <enter> the underlying issue. <enter>  <enter> Fixes gh-1103
Polishing
Revert 'Add failure analyzer for BeanCreationException' <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-9220

Make containsDescendantOf a default method <enter>  <enter> Change `ConfigurationPropertySource.containsDescendantOf` to have a <enter> default implementation that return `UNKNOWN`. <enter>  <enter> Fixes gh-12539

Expose internal APIs for pluggable file systems. <enter>  <enter> We aren't yet ready to make FileSystem a public type, but I don't mind <enter> making it _almost_ available via an internal API for those brave enough <enter> to try that. <enter>  <enter> Also migrate all of our tests to use the in memory file system. It's simpler. <enter>  <enter> https://github.com/square/okhttp/issues/1459

Add /error to ignored paths for security autoconfig <enter>  <enter> Protecting /error doesn't make a great deal of sense and if it is <enter> protected you don't get the ErrorPageFilter for the attempt at loading <enter> it, so Tomcat renders its own HTML error page (when deployed as WAR). <enter>  <enter> Fixes gh-1548

Rename samples to smoke tests <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-17197

Fix documentation example <enter>  <enter> Previously, the nested private static class would cause an error at <enter> startup stating that it was not accessible when trying to bind the <enter> property from the environment. The nested class should be public. <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-4323
Apply spring.jackson.* config to Spring Data REST object mappers <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-1698

Remove use of regular expressions in Spring profile-based doc matching <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-1309
Forbid null for a response's message. <enter>  <enter> This was only ever null in test code. Everything that parses responses from <enter> the network gets a non-null value. The message may be empty.
Add error-prone compiler and fix its found issues.
Migrate LogbackLoggingSystemTests to JUnit 5 <enter>  <enter> See gh-17107

Improve startup times <enter>  <enter> Improve startup times (although not by much) by adding more background <enter> pre-initializers and lazily evaluating the whitelabel SpEL view. <enter>  <enter> See gh-6177
Added support for http/2 draft 12, which is incompatible with previous priority schemes.
Upgrade to Tomcat 8.5.14 <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-8958
Reformat code using Spring code formatter plugin
Fix checkstyle violation <enter>  <enter> See gh-21266

Remove unnecessary null check <enter>  <enter> See gh-17916
Fix NPE in FlywayEndpoint when migration.installedOn is null <enter>  <enter> See gh-14019
Polish RSocket support

Reinstate devtools debug logging with opt-out <enter>  <enter> Reinstate `web` logging when devtools is in use, making use of the new <enter> logging groups support. Devtools now also logs an `INFO` message <enter> informing that properties defaults are offers an easy way to disable <enter> them. <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-14450
Fix typos in the documentation: though -> through <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-1510

Ensure JPA vendor properties are period separated <enter>  <enter> If you bind to Map<String,Object> you get a nested Map instead <enter> of period-separated keys. This change just makes JpaProperties <enter> expose a Map<String,String> so the keys are sane. <enter>  <enter> Fixes gh-988
Fix checkstyle header violation <enter>  <enter> See gh-24337

Track Connection ownership. <enter>  <enter> Connection ownership is somewhat racy: when an HttpURLConnection reads <enter> the last byte of a connection, its ownership is released and given to <enter> the connection pool.
Handle null fragments.

Remove HSQLDB dependency from Batch Starter <enter>  <enter> This commit removes HSQLDB dependency from Batch Starter as most apps <enter> that use Spring Batch will prefer to use a RDBMS of their choice to store <enter> batch metadata. <enter>  <enter> Additionally, explicit spring-jdbc dependency has been replaced with JDBC <enter> Starter dependency. <enter>  <enter> See gh-6081
Change HttpURL.redact() to return a String.
Clarify h2-console requires a servlet-based web app <enter>  <enter> Fixes gh-12603

Honour ext and classifier on @Grabbed dependencies <enter>  <enter> We currently honour type, but ignore ext. Aether doesn't make a <enter> distinction between the two so a Grab that specifies both type and ext <enter> but with different values is considered to be an error. <enter>  <enter> Fixes #995

Do not enable cglib if spring.aop.proxy-target-class is configured <enter>  <enter> This commit makes sure to honour the `spring.aop.proxy-target-class` <enter> property if set by the user. Previously, the <enter> `PersistenceExceptionTranslationPostProcessor` was always configured to <enter> use cglib, regardless of the value of that property. <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-8887
Try to make CouchbaseAutoConfigurationIntegrationTests less flakey <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-19932

Fix datasource metrics doc <enter>  <enter> The maximum and minimum number of connections are no metrics so these <enter> are not exposed. Fix the doc that stated the contrary. <enter>  <enter> Fixes gh-3319

Collapse interceptors into a single chain. <enter>  <enter> Instead of having a chain of application interceptors and a separate chain <enter> of network interceptors, this makes a single heterogeneous chain. It makes <enter> the OkHttp core and network caller into interceptors.
Use Supplier variants of Assert methods <enter>  <enter> See gh-12630
Confirm that we use GMT formatting in setIfModifiedSince().
Polish

Don't explode if we can't find an interface for a local address. <enter>  <enter> We'll likely explode later when attempting to use the socket. <enter> But that will fail with an IOException, unlike this which was <enter> failing with a NullPointerException.
Update appendix with details of new Spring HATEOAS property <enter>  <enter> Follow-on from c55900b4. <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-3891

Fix profile precedence when active and include provided <enter>  <enter> Before 2.0.2, if profiles were activated via the environment using the <enter> active and include profile property, profiles specified via the active <enter> property would take precedence. This commit restores that behavior. <enter>  <enter> Fixes gh-13513
Polish contribution <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-7004
Do not allow remote peer to arbitrarily size the HPACK decoder dynamic table.
Add wildcard hostnames support in CertificatePinner
Make Jest available to javadoc generation <enter>  <enter> See gh-6032

Add option to exclude devtools from fat jar <enter>  <enter> Add an `excludeDevtools` property to both the Maven and Gradle plugin <enter> that removes `org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-devtools` (if <enter> necessary) when repackaging the application. <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-3171
Update actuator security documentation <enter>  <enter> Update documentation to align with the new role based method. <enter>  <enter> See gh-6889

Align expectations of various JMX configurations <enter>  <enter> They all want to create an MBeanServer and when that happens <enter> user sees no MBeans, or sometimes just one set (Spring Core, <enter> Spring Integration or Spring Boot). To harmonise them we <enter> create a @Bean of type MBeanServer and link to it in the <enter> other autoconfigs <enter>  <enter> Fixes gh-1046

Fix description of test file to be tests.groovy <enter>  <enter> Corrected the documentation to refer to file as tests.groovy, rather <enter> than test.groovy. Updated cope snippet as tests.groovy should expect <enter> 'Hello World!' rather than 'Hello World'. <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-1593

Prepend without replacing in HttpMessageConverters <enter>  <enter> It was incorrect to simply replace existing instances because you can't <enter> tell from the instance which media types and java types it supports. This <enter> fix just prepends the custom converters so they get higher priority. <enter>  <enter> Fixes gh-1293
Upgrade to Webjars Locator Core 0.40 <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-18073
Upgrade to Solr 8.2.0 <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-17718
Upgrade to Spring Session Bean-RC1 <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-14573
Correct UTF8 BOM is EFBBBF
Fix conditions that lead to auto-configure PushGateway <enter>  <enter> See gh-22919

Extract logic for duplicate file removal so it can be shared <enter>  <enter> .. between Maven and Gradle plugins. Also fixed bug in recursive <enter> scanning logic. <enter>  <enter> Really fixes gh-614

Add external-file-property to LogFileMvcEndpoint <enter>  <enter> Add an additional property to LogFileMvcEndpoint to allow log files to <enter> be read from an external location. This is helpful when a launch.script <enter> is used to start the boot-application and the logfile is written by a <enter> redirect of stdout/stderr. <enter>  <enter> Fixes gh-4255 <enter> Closes gh-4836
Some POST samples.
APIs to set and remove path segments.

Log classpath once environment has been prepared <enter>  <enter> Previously, the classpath would be logged in response to the <enter> ApplicationStartedEvent. At this point, logging could be disabled <enter> while the logging system is being initialized, or because the <enter> log levels configured in the environment have not yet been applied. <enter>  <enter> This commit moves the logging to happen in response to an <enter> ApplicationEnvironmentPreparedEvent by which point the logging <enter> system has been initialized and its levels have been configured. <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-5313
Add OAuth2 resource server sample <enter>  <enter> Shows how to use @EnableResourceServer in a pure resource <enter> server and configure the secure paths.
Expose running and queued call counts for monitoring
Fix doc formatting <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-6275
Upgrade to Jakarta Annotation 1.3.5 <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-18050

Order char encoding filter so it sets encoding before request is read <enter>  <enter> For the character encoding filter to work, it's vital that it sets <enter> the request's encoding before any other filters attempt to read the <enter> request. This commit updates the order of <enter> OrderedCharacterEncodingFilter to be HIGHEST_PRECEDENCE and improves <enter> the existing test to check that the ordering is as required. <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-3912
Permit release candidates in version numbers.
Upgrade to Spring AMQP 2.1.2.RELEASE <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-15271
Upgrade to Jboss Transaction Spi 7.6.0.Final <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-9182
Fix broken links in the documentation
Use HTML entity for ampersand.
Write some new connection pool tests. <enter>  <enter> These use the Call APIs. They're high-level so they won't break with the <enter> implementation rewrite.
Implement query parameter management. <enter>  <enter> The tricky part of this is '+' and ' ' management.

Auto-configure Neo4J BookmarkManager when possible <enter>  <enter> Add `Neo4jBookmarkManagementConfiguration` which provides an instance <enter> of `BookmarkManager` if necessary and Caffeine cache is on the <enter> classpath. Depending on the kind of application, the `BookmarkManager` <enter> will be request scoped or singleton, as recommended by Spring Data <enter> Neo4j. <enter>  <enter> See gh-14568
Use lambdas for map entry iteration where possible <enter>  <enter> See gh-12626

Fix TLS requiresTunnel which was being computed incorrectly. <enter>  <enter> We were only returning 'true' once we were already in a tunnel. <enter> This was bogus. In theory a TLS tunnel sending extra data could <enter> be corrupted due to this bug. <enter>  <enter> Also migrate one of the TLS tunnel tests to use SslContextBuilder <enter> instead of TestSSLContext.

Fix data type of telnet and ssh ports <enter>  <enter> Define shell.ssh.port and shell.telnet.port as integer properties <enter> so that the generated meta-data exposes the proper type. <enter>  <enter> Fixes gh-2076
Restore support for ResponseCache.setDefault().
Document AWS Elastic Beanstalk deployment <enter>  <enter> Update the reference documentation to include details of Amazon <enter> Elastic Beanstalk. <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-7948

Automatically X-Forwarded-For in the cloud <enter>  <enter> Update `ServerProperties` to automatically enable `use-forward-headers` <enter> when running on a cloud platform. <enter>  <enter> A new `CloudPlatform` enum has been introduced that detects Heroku and <enter> Cloud Foundry. <enter>  <enter> See gh-4018
Upgrade to Mongo Driver Reactivestreams 1.9.1 <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-14391
Update maven-dependency-plugin to version 2.9 <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-1862

Exclude @ManagedResources from Endpoint MBeans <enter>  <enter> If an Endpoint is already @ManagedResource then it doesn't need <enter> an additional (probably wrong) MBEan registration based on the invoke() <enter> method.
Allow specifying a socket factory for connections. <enter>  <enter> This socket factory will be used for all non-proxy connections and HTTP proxy connections.
Handle UnsupportedCharsetException in HttpLoggingInterceptor

Blitz some more special characters from the metric names <enter>  <enter> When MVC path matchers are used as metric keys, they can still contain <enter> invalid characters and patterns (like asterisks). This change removes <enter> some more special characters and also tidies up the names a bit so <enter> no key part starts or ends with '-' (which is ugly). <enter>  <enter> Fixes gh-1528
Close the source after reading regardless of result.

Disallow all extensions in actuator endpoints (except .json) <enter>  <enter> Along with the recent change in Spring to use content-disposition <enter> 'inline' (which prevents the download), it also makes sense to limit <enter> the extensions allowed by the actuator endpoints. Really there *is* <enter> no extension for these endpoints, but since all of them explicitly <enter> produce JSON we can add .json for browsers as a convenience in case <enter> the app would otherwise choose to send XML. <enter>  <enter> Fixes gh-4402
Complete documentation of logger-name with out-of-box logging groups <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-14456

Change HttpResponseCache to not implement java.net.ResponseCache. <enter>  <enter> This marks some methods as @Deprecated and internal-only. <enter> Unfortunately we don't have a great mechanism to hide them from <enter> the documented API.
Tweak error copy, add a couple tests
Small cleanups. <enter>  <enter> Return the OkHttpClient on setters. <enter> Remove some completed TODOs in Call. <enter> Link to Okio in Javadoc.
Really support requests greater than 2 GiB. <enter>  <enter> git-svn-id: https://mockwebserver.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@45 cf848351-439f-e86a-257f-67fa721851d5
Polish
Servlet path not explicitly required for EndpointRequest

Configure PathPattern for RSocket routing <enter>  <enter> This commit configures a `PathPatternRouteMatcher` in the RSocket <enter> support if spring-web is on the classpath. This `RouteMatcher` <enter> implementation is more efficient than the `SimpleRouteMatcher`, which is <enter> based on the `AntPathMatcher`. <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-16865
Upgrade to Spring Framework 5.2.2.RELEASE <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-19076
Fix checkstyle violations
Use OkBuffer in Http20Draft09Test.

Rename preferred-mapper property so its clear it only applies to JSON <enter>  <enter> preferred-mapper has been renamed to preferred-json-mapper to make it <enter> clear that it only affects the JSON mapper and that the XML mapper <enter> that will be used (if any) is unaffected <enter>  <enter> See gh-2247

Make WebClientCustomizer optional for WebClient <enter>  <enter> This commit removes the required dependency on `WebClientCustomizer` <enter> instances when creating `WebClient` beans, making it optional. <enter>  <enter> Closes gh-12458
We don't need no stinkin braces.

Allow JSON Testers to be `@Autowired` <enter>  <enter> Switch `@AutoConfigureJsonTesters` to use regular `@Autowired` injection <enter> for JSON testers. Prior to this commit JSON Tester fields were <enter> initialized directly which caused IDE issues and was also a little <enter> confusing. <enter>  <enter> Fixes gh-6451
Add documentation for Hypermedia endpoints
Polish
